    • runPower

      public void runPower​(ModelGame modelGame, Worker worker, Cell position) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Execute the state action and remove in the second movement the first worker position
      Overrides:
      runPower in class Power
      Parameters:
      modelGame - is the model of the game
      worker - is the worker used by the player
      position - is the position where the action will be acted
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if position is not a valid cell
